content: Hi @T-compiler/meeting ; This topic is going to be a (hopefully) high signal-to-noise area to do announcements and summarize achievements or insights from this weeks sprint.

The main announcement is that I have created an area for more unstructured socialization between people working on the sprint, see #t-compiler/shrinkmem-sprint > sprint day 1 chat for that. So if you're interested in participating in the sprint, make sure to check out the chatter over there!
